sourcesContent:
import React, { ElementType, ReactNode } from 'react' import { Flex, Heading, Text, TextProps } from '@saltswap/uikit' import SecondaryCard from './SecondaryCard' interface StatBoxProps extends TextProps { icon: ElementType title: ReactNode subtitle: ReactNode isDisabled?: boolean } const StatBox: React.FC = ({ icon: Icon, title, subtitle, isDisabled = false, ...props }) => (
{title} {subtitle}
) export default StatBox
